headline: Assessing Capital One Financial's Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Recent share performance and business snapshot Capital One Financial (COF) has drawn attention after a stretch of weaker recent returns, with the stock down about 10% over the past month and past 3 months, and 21% year to date. At a last close of US$195.61, the US based bank holding company is being weighed against its mixed return profile, with a 1 year total return near flat but stronger 3 and 5 year total returns.
